author: Adrian Collins
description:
With only a few weeks to go until Casthen Gain by Essa Hansen hits the shelves, it’s time to get a look inside for a bit of a sci-fantasy entree before the main course hits on the 28th of July 2025. I am so excited for this book to hit the shelves–available in ebook, paperback, and […]

title: First look at Casthen Gain by Essa Hansen: read the entire first chapter!
